Package org.jsimpledb.kv.util

Utility classes relating to the KVDatabase interface.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractKVNavigableMap<K,V>
    NavigableMap support superclass for maps backed by keys and values encoded as byte[] keys and values in a KVStore, and whose key sort order is consistent with the byte[] key encoding.
    AbstractKVNavigableSet<E>
    NavigableSet support superclass for sets backed by elements encoded as byte[] keys in a KVStore and whose sort order is consistent with their byte[] key encoding.
    KVNavigableMap
    A mutable NavigableSet view of the keys and values in a KVStore.
    KVNavigableSet
    A NavigableSet view of the keys in a KVStore.
    LockManager
    Manager of read/write locks on byte[] key ranges that ensures isolation and serialization while allowing concurrent access by multiple threads to a single underlying byte[] key/value store.
    LockOwner
    Represents the owner of a Lock managed by a LockManager.
    NavigableMapKVStore
    Provides a KVStore view of an underlying NavigableMap whose keys are sorted lexicographically as unsigned bytes.
    XMLSerializer
    Utility methods for serializing and deserializing the contents of a KVDatabase to/from XML.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LockManager.LockResult
    Possible return values from LockManager.lock().

Package org.jsimpledb.kv.util Description
